column4: hi, i just installed ubuntu on my laptop.  If I close the lid, the computer locksup and needs to be hard-booted.  Can someone point me in the right direction to change the power-saving settings?  Is there a gnome/X-based config tool for this?
you could try to turn it off in the display adapter, I belive that's called when you close the lid
- u mean in the Advanced tab for the Screensaver settings?  (Display Power Management)
